'''Mysterious Flyer''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained during {{Quest|Secret Identity}}.

==Text==
"Teyvat's Big Sister<br>Gentle and kind, she answers all your questions<br>She'll help you be rid of all your troubles!"

==Trivia==
* The pamphlet shown in the icon is written in the [[Inazuman Language]]:<br>''TWDNMTVYSNCA''<br>''SHN{{tt|$|Genshin Impact Wiki notation for this symbol, see Inazuman Language}}TNBJYCBYISDYK''<br>''NXMSUDNRMS''
